Uses of Package
org.deidentifier.arx.masking

  • Packages that use org.deidentifier.arx.masking 
    Package Description
    org.deidentifier.arx.masking
    This package provides a variety of tools for data masking.
  • Classes in org.deidentifier.arx.masking used by org.deidentifier.arx.masking 
    Class and Description
    AbstractDictionaryMasker
    Performs data masking on whole dictionaries of data of type T.
    AbstractInstBasedDictMasker
    Performs data masking on a dictionary of values of type T by applying instance masking on each value.
    AbstractReplaceInstMasker
    Performs data masking by replacing the input data with new values for each data instance, generated independently from the input.
    IDictionaryMasker
    Performs data masking on a whole dictionary of data of type T.
    IInstanceMasker
    Performs data masking on single instances of data of type T.
    Random
    Provides quick access to an alternative random number generator used instead of the standard RNG Random, because of its mediocre statistical qualities.
    ReplaceDictMasker
    Replaces the list of input data with the provided replacement list.
    ReplaceInstMasker
    Replaces the input data with a constant replacement value.
    ShuffleMasker
    Masks a dictionary of data by shuffling its values around.
